title: Bodoni Black alternatives
content:
Looking for something with the same air/style as Bodoni (and potentially Cabernet) particularly the black version - for display text.

Cheers pople.
author: Ratbaggy

comments.content: Fortunately I've made a list of [extra bold didones](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816120359/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/didone_extra_bold/) that's perfect for the occasion.
